about_the_game:
Metastrike is a FPS game where every second counts and every move can turn the tide of battle. In a world plunged into chaos, you and your squad are the last line of defense against complete collapse. From crumbling city streets to secret military installations, every location becomes a high-stakes battleground where teamwork is your greatest weapon.

Metastrike, hesitation is not an option. Each match pits two elite teams against each other in a relentless contest of reflexes and coordination. Master a cutting-edge arsenal of modern weaponry, from assault rifles and sniper rifles to tactical gadgets, all customizable to fit your playstyle.

Key Features:

High-Paced Action: Experience relentless, fast-paced combat where every action can make or break the outcome in an instant.

Team-Based Excellence: Victory depends on seamless teamwork and strategic coordination. Adapt and execute plans on the fly to outsmart your opponents.

Diverse and Complex Maps: Battle across various environments, from bustling urban areas to abandoned military outposts, each requiring creative and adaptable strategies.

Authentic Combat Experience: Immerse yourself in intense firefights with realistic sound effects, detailed graphics, and visceral combat that brings the FPS experience to life.

Competitive Ranked Mode: Climb the ranks in a fierce competitive mode where every match presents new challenges and opportunities to prove your skills.

Metastrike is more than just a shootout – it’s a test of strategic thinking, speed, and team synergy. Step into the fray and become a legend!

name: MetaStrike

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA Geforce GTX670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

short_description: Metastrike is an FPS where every second matters. In a world on the brink, you and your squad are the last defense against chaos. Battle through crumbling cities and secret military bases, with each location a high-stakes arena where teamwork is key to survival.
